short_summary: delivery of indicator and transmitter equipment
description: The Department of National Defence requires delivery of indicator and transmitter equipment to multiple locations.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Transmitter and Indicator for National Defence Canada
## Publication Information
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-241929/A
* **Publication Date**: 2024-01-08
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-21T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity Name**: National Defence Canada

## Supply Requirement
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of transmitter and indicator systems. The required items are:

* Indicator, Sight, Liquid [Model 304-R 0.75IN, NCAGE: 51857, Ernst, John C & Co, Inc.]
	+ Quantity: 12 (5 units for CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and 7 units for CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia)
* Transmitter, Liquid Quantity [Part No.: 124302, NCAGE: 04034, Gems Sensors Inc.]
	+ Quantity: 8 (5 units for CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and 3 units for CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia)

### Submission Requirements
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Equivalent or substitute products must be indicated with their brand name, model, and/or part number, and NCAGE.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Preference and Terms
* A preference is given to Canadian goods and/or services.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Contact Information
* Katharine Barker, Contracting Authority
* Email: [Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (555) 555-5555

### Attachments
The following documents are available for download:
* Amendment 002 to W8482-241929/A [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28956/amendment-002-w8482-241929-a-eng_0.pdf)
* Request for Proposal - W8482-241929/A [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28956/rfp-w8482-241929-eng.pdf)
